verses.verse: Then shall <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> and <S%H171>Aholiab<s%>, and every <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, in <S%H1992>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H6213>work<s%> all manner of <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, according to all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> and <S%H171>Aholiab<s%>, and every <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, in whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, even every one whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> stirred him <S%H5375>up<s%> to <S%H7126>come<s%> unto the <S%H4399>work<s%> to do <S%H6213>it<s%>:

And they <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> all the <S%H8641>offering<s%>, which the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, to <S%H6213>make<s%> it <S%H935>with<s%>. And they brought yet unto him free <S%H5071>offerings<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

And all the wise <S%H2450>men<s%>, that <S%H6213>did<s%> all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H4399>work<s%> which they <S%H6213>made<s%>;

And they <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> much <S%H7235>more<s%> than <S%H1767>enough<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4399>work<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> gave <S%H6680>commandment<s%>, and they caused it to be <S%H6963>proclaimed<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let neither <S%H376>man<s%> nor <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> any more <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>. So the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3607>restrained<s%> from <S%H935>bringing<s%>.
For the <S%H4399>stuff<s%> they had was <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for all the <S%H4399>work<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3498>it<s%>, and too much.

And every <S%H2450>wise<s%> hearted <S%H3820>man<s%> among them that <S%H6213>done<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>: with <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> of <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> made he <S%H6213>them<s%>.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>: the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> were all of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>size<s%>.

And he <S%H2266>coupled<s%> the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> unto <S%H259>another<s%>: and the other <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> he <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> unto <S%H259>another<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> from the woven <S%H7098>edge<s%> in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%>: likewise he <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H7020>outermost<s%> <S%H8193>side<s%> of another <S%H3407>curtain<s%>, in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%>.

<S%H2572>Fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%>, and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> which was in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%>: the <S%H3924>loops<s%> <S%H6901>held<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> curtain to <S%H259>another<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H2266>coupled<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> unto <S%H259>another<s%> with the <S%H7165>clasps<s%>: so it became <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' hair for the <S%H168>tent<s%> over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>: <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> he made <S%H6213>them<s%>.

The <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3407>curtain<s%>: the <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>size<s%>.
And he <S%H2266>coupled<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%> by <S%H8337>themselves<s%>, and six curtains by <S%H3407>themselves<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> upon the <S%H7020>outermost<s%> <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> in the <S%H4225>coupling<s%>, and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3924>loops<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he upon the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H3407>curtain<s%> which <S%H2279>couples<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H7165>clasps<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> to <S%H2266>couple<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H2266>together<s%>, that it might be <S%H259>one<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4372>covering<s%> for the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red<s%>, and a <S%H4372>covering<s%> of <S%H8476>badgers<s%>' <S%H5785>skins<s%> above <S%H4605>that<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, standing <S%H5975>up<s%>.
The <S%H753>length<s%> of a <S%H7175>board<s%> was <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of a <S%H7175>board<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%>.

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%>, equally <S%H7947>distant<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H413>from<s%> <S%H259>another<s%>: thus did he <S%H6213>make<s%> for all the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>; <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%>:

And <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> under the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> for his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>tenons<s%>.

And for the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, which is toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>corner<s%>, he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>,

And their <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> under <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%>.
And for the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>.
And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he for the <S%H4742>corners<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> in the two <S%H3411>sides<s%>.

And they were <S%H8382>coupled<s%> <S%H4295>beneath<s%>, and <S%H8382>coupled<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H259>there<s%>, to one <S%H2885>ring<s%>: thus he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H8147>both<s%> of them in <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H4740>corners<s%>.

And there were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7175>boards<s%>; and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> were <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, under <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7175>board<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>; <S%H2568>five<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>,

And <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> for the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> for the <S%H3411>sides<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H1280>bar<s%> to <S%H1272>shoot<s%> <S%H8432>through<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> to the <S%H7097>other<s%>.

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H7175>boards<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> their <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> to be <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H1280>bars<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H6532>veil<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>: with <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he it of <S%H2803>skillful<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> to it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6823>wood<s%>, and overlaid them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>: their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> were of <S%H2091>gold<s%>; and he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%>, and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%>, of <S%H7551>needlework<s%>;

And the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of it with their <S%H2053>hooks<s%>: and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> their <S%H7218>capitals<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%>: but their <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> were of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.
